name: Lara Grice
biography: Lara Grice was born on August 11, 1971 in New Orleans, Louisiana, USA. She is an actress, known for Girls Trip (2017), Logan (2017) and Queen Sugar (2016). She has been married to Stephen Perret since November 23, 2012.::Anonymous
trivia: B.A. in Drama from the University of Dallas
Has appeared in movies with WWE stars John Cena, Rob Van Dam & Paul Wight (aka "The Big Show").

Her mother, Carolyn, wrote a note to get her out of school when she was only 8 years old to go see her very first movie, "Hair." That Christmas, when her grandmother gave her very first $20.00 bill , she went straight to the record store to buy her very first album: the soundtrack to "Hair." Years later, she actually spent some screen time with her very first childhood crush, Treat Williams -- in both The Staircase Murders (2007) and Maskerade (2010).
Best Actress Nominee (2013) - Terror Film Festival (Philadelphia) - Rainbows End - short (2012).
Grice began her career studying at the University of Dallas, the alma mater of Peter MacNicol.
Appeared in The Big Short (2015) which won the 2016 Academy Award for Best Writing, Adapted Screenplay and which was also nominated for Best Picture.
Appeared in Rectify (2013), the recipient of the 2015 Peabody Award.
Was originally cast as the Hypnotized Woman in Now You See Me (2013) but had to drop out to play Megan Harris in Treme (2012) opposite David Morse which was shooting the same day.
Was cast as the Doctor in When the Game Stands Tall (2014) but had to drop out due to scheduling conflicts.
